Package src.Controller.Suggestions.Staff

Class StaffSuggestionsController

java.lang.Object
src.Controller.Suggestions.SuggestionController
src.Controller.Suggestions.Staff.StaffSuggestionsController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IStaffSuggestionsController
public class StaffSuggestionsController extends SuggestionController implements IStaffSuggestionsController
Controller class for managing suggestions related to staff. Extends SuggestionController and implements IStaffSuggestionsController, providing functionality for viewing and approving suggestions.

  • Constructor Details

      public StaffSuggestionsController(SuggestionsDataHandler data)

  • Method Details

    • viewSuggestions

      public void viewSuggestions(Staff staff)
      Displays suggestions related to the camps created by a specific staff member. The suggestions are presented in a tabular format including details such as suggestion number, the suggestion text, the user ID of the camp committee member who made the suggestion, and the approval status.
      Specified by:
      viewSuggestions in interface IStaffSuggestionsController
      Parameters:
      staff - The staff member whose camp suggestions are to be viewed.

    • approveSuggestions

      public void approveSuggestions(Staff staff, int index)
      Approves a specific suggestion made for a camp created by the staff member. It also increments the points of the camp committee member who made the suggestion.
      Specified by:
      approveSuggestions in interface IStaffSuggestionsController
      Parameters:
      staff - The staff member approving the suggestion.
      index - The index of the suggestion in the list of suggestions to be approved.
